sections.sectionTitle: General Information (Gbogbo Nkan Wey You Suppose Know)

content.question: Wetin be Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Palma Wallet na cryptocurrency wallet app wey dey let users keep, send, and receive digital money (assets) safe safe. E focus on to give user-friendly interface (wey easy to use) and still maintain strong security for cryptocurrency transactions.

content.question: Which cryptocurrencies Palma Wallet dey support?
content.answer: Palma Wallet yana goyon bayan USDT (Tether) a kan cibiyoyin sadarwa na ERC20 (Ethereum) da TRC20 (TRON). Yana goyon bayan USDC (USD Coin) a kan cibiyar sadarwa ta ERC20. Shirye-shiryen ƙara wasu nau'ikan cryptocurrencies suna nan a nan gaba.

content.question: Palma Wallet free to use?
content.answer: Palma Wallet free to download and use. Dem no dey charge any fees by the wallet itself for basic things wey you dey do. But, blockchain transaction fees (network fees) dey apply when you dey send cryptocurrencies, and e dey vary (dey different) depending on the network wey you use (ERC20 or TRC20).

sections.sectionTitle: Account Management (How You Fit Manage Your Account)

content.question: How I fit create Palma Wallet account?
content.answer: You fit create Palma Wallet account by signing in with Google, Apple, or phone verification. After authentication (dem confirm say na you), dem go generate secure cryptographic key pair (special code) for your wallet to make sure your transaction dey secure.

content.question: Which authentication methods Palma Wallet dey support?
content.answer: Palma Wallet dey support three authentication methods: Google Sign-In, Apple Sign-In, and phone number verification. Dis ones dey provide secure and easy ways to access your wallet.

content.question: How Palma Wallet dey make sure say my account dey secure?
content.answer: Palma Wallet dey use several security measures (ways to protect you) like: generating cryptographic key pairs (public and private keys) for each user, keeping private keys safe for inside encrypted storage for your device, using digital signatures to check say transaction na original, and providing backup options for your private keys wey password dey protect.

content.question: Wetin go happen if I lose access to my device (my phone loss)?
content.answer: If you don create backup of your private key for Settings screen, you fit restore your wallet for new device using the backup and your password. Without backup, you fit lose access to your money, so to create secure backup dey very important.

content.question: How I fit sign out of Palma Wallet?
content.answer: You fit sign out by either tapping the 'Sign Out' button for the header of the Home screen or by going to Settings > Account Actions > Sign Out. When you sign out, your wallet data dey preserved (dem go keep am) locally to maintain access to your private keys and wallet information.

sections.sectionTitle: Wallet Security (How Your Wallet Take Secure)

content.question: How dem dey store my private key for Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Dem dey store your private key securely using React Native EncryptedStorage, wey dey use platform-specific encryption methods (Keychain on iOS and Keystore on Android). The private key no dey ever leave your device unencrypted (without security cover).

content.question: How I fit back up my wallet?
content.answer: To back up your wallet: 1) Go to Settings, 2) Navigate to the 'Wallet Security' section, 3) Enter strong password (minimum 8 characters), 4) Confirm your password, 5) Tap 'Secure Backup'. Store your backup password safe safe – without am, you no fit restore your wallet.

content.question: Wetin go happen if I forget my backup password?
content.answer: If you forget your backup password, you no go fit restore your wallet from the backup. No password recovery mechanism (way to get password back) for security reasons. Na why e dey crucial (very important) to store your backup password for safe and memorable place.

content.question: How transaction signing dey work for Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Palma Wallet dey use cryptographic signing for all transactions. When you start transaction, the app dey create digital signature using your private key. Dis signature dey prove say you authorize the transaction without showing your private key. Dem dey verify the signature for blockchain using your public key.

content.question: My data dey synchronized (dey update for all my phone) across devices?
content.answer: Your basic account information dey stored on Palma servers, but your private keys dey remain only on your device for security. If you wan use your wallet on multiple devices, you need to use the backup and restore functionality on each device.

sections.sectionTitle: Cryptocurrency Transactions (How You Dey Do Crypto Transaction)

content.question: How I fit send cryptocurrency with Palma Wallet?
content.answer: To send cryptocurrency: 1) Tap the 'Send' button for Home screen, 2) Enter the recipient wallet address or scan their QR code, 3) Enter the amount wey you wan send, 4) Select the network (ERC20 or TRC20), 5) Review the transaction details including fees, 6) Confirm to send. Dem go process the transaction for blockchain.

content.question: How I fit receive cryptocurrency with Palma Wallet?
content.answer: To receive cryptocurrency: 1) Tap the 'Receive' button for Home screen, 2) Your wallet address go display with QR code, 3) Share dis address with the sender, 4) Make sure the sender use the correct network (ERC20 or TRC20), 5) Once dem confirm the transaction for blockchain, the money go appear for your wallet.

content.question: Wetin be the difference between ERC20 and TRC20 networks?
content.answer: ERC20 na the token standard for Ethereum blockchain, while TRC20 na the standard for TRON blockchain. The main differences include: 1) Transaction fees - ERC20 normally get higher fees, 2) Confirmation time - TRC20 usually dey faster, 3) Security aspects - Dem see ERC20 as more established (e don tey). Always make sure say sender and receiver dey use the same network.

content.question: How long transactions dey take to complete?
content.answer: Transaction times dey vary by network: 1) ERC20 (Ethereum) transactions normally dey take between 30 seconds to several minutes, depending on network congestion (how busy network be) and the gas fee wey dem pay, 2) TRC20 (TRON) transactions usually dey faster, dey take like 15-30 seconds. Dis times na for blockchain confirmations, e no include time wey you need to prepare and sign transactions.

content.question: Wetin be transaction fees and how dem dey work?
content.answer: Transaction fees na payments to blockchain network validators (people wey dey check transaction) wey dey process transactions. 1) For ERC20 (Ethereum), dem dey call fees 'gas fees' and e fit vary well well based on network congestion, 2) For TRC20 (TRON), fees normally dey much lower and more stable. Palma Wallet dey display the expected fee before you confirm transaction, wey go let you make informed decision (know wetin you dey do).

content.question: Wetin be the Swap feature for Palma Wallet?
content.answer: The Swap feature dey allow you exchange one cryptocurrency for another directly inside the Palma Wallet app. E dey provide easy way to convert between digital assets (money) without using external exchange. Dem go expand dis feature for future updates to support more currency pairs and better rates.

content.question: My transaction dey pending for long time. Wetin I suppose do?
content.answer: For long-pending transactions: 1) Check the network status - high congestion (network busy) fit delay processing, 2) For ERC20 transactions, the gas fee fit be too low during high demand periods (when plenty people dey use am), 3) Verify say your internet connection dey stable, 4) Wait for blockchain confirmation - sometimes e dey take longer during peak periods, 5) If the problem still dey after more than few hours, contact support with your transaction details.

content.question: I send money go wrong address. I fit get am back?
content.answer: Unfortunately, blockchain transactions dey irreversible (you no fit change am) once dem confirm am. If you send money go incorrect address: 1) If you know the person wey receive am, contact dem directly make dem send am back, 2) If you send am to exchange or service, contact their customer support, 3) If you send am to random address, to recover am generally no possible. Always double-check addresses before you confirm transactions.

content.question: Why I no fit see my balance after I receive transaction?
content.answer: If your balance no dey update: 1) Confirm say the transaction get enough blockchain confirmations (check the explorer), 2) Verify say na correct network you dey check (ERC20 vs TRC20), 3) Restart the app to refresh your balance, 4) Check if the sender don actually complete the transaction for their end, 5) If dem don confirm the transaction for blockchain but e no dey show for app, contact support.

content.question: The app dey crash when I try send transaction. Wetin I suppose do?
content.answer: If the app dey crash during transactions: 1) Update to the latest app version, 2) Restart your device, 3) Check your internet connection, 4) Make sure say you get sufficient balance (including for transaction fees), 5) If the problem still dey, try reinstalling the app (make sure say you get your backup first!), 6) Contact support if none of these solutions work, give dem details about your device and wetin happen when e crash.

sections.sectionTitle: Technical Details (Nitty Gritty Of How E Be)

content.question: Which cryptographic methods Palma Wallet dey use?
content.answer: Palma Wallet dey use RSA cryptography for im initial version, e con dey transition (dey change) to FIO Protocol library for newer versions. Dem dey use dis cryptographic methods to generate key pairs, sign transactions, and verify signatures. The implementation include proper key generation, secure signing procedures, and strong verification methods to make sure transaction dey secure.

content.question: How Palma Wallet dey verify transaction signatures?
content.answer: Palma Wallet dey verify signatures using public key cryptography: 1) When dem create transaction, dem dey generate digital signature using the sender private key, 2) Dem dey send the signature, with the transaction data, go server, 3) The server go retrieve the user public key from database, 4) Using cryptographic verification algorithms (special maths), the server go confirm say the signature valid for the transaction data and na only person wey get the corresponding private key fit create am, without ever needing to access the private key itself.

content.question: Wetin be the backend infrastructure for Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Palma Wallet dey use AWS (Amazon Web Services) for im backend infrastructure. User data dey stored for DynamoDB tables, with the region set to us-east-1 (Cape Town). The architecture include serverless components with Lambda functions wey dey handle transaction processing and user data management. Dem no dey ever store user private keys for server - na only public keys dem dey store to verify transaction signatures.

content.question: How key generation dey work for Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Key generation for Palma Wallet don evolve (change) with different versions: 1) Initial version use RSA cryptography with fallback mechanisms (other ways) if RSA no dey available, 2) Latest version dey use FIO Protocol for key generation, where dem dey generate random bytes as seed, then dem go process am through cryptographic functions to create private key, from which dem go derive public key. Dis approach dey make sure say key pairs wey secure, collision-resistant (e no fit clash with another person own), and unique to each user na im dem dey create.

sections.sectionTitle: Upcoming Features (Things Wey Still Dey Come)

content.question: Which new cryptocurrencies dem go add to Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Palma Wallet dey plan to expand support pass USDT to include major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and different stablecoins (USDC, DAI). The roadmap (plan) also include support for popular tokens for both Ethereum and TRON networks.

content.question: Palma Wallet go support hardware wallets?
content.answer: Yes, Palma Wallet dey plan to add support for popular hardware wallets like Ledger and Trezor for future update. Dis go allow users connect their hardware wallets for additional security while dem still dey enjoy the user-friendly interface of Palma Wallet.

content.question: Plan dey to add DeFi features to Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Yes, Palma Wallet get plans to introduce DeFi (Decentralized Finance) features for future updates. Dis ones go include staking, yield farming, and integration with popular DeFi protocols, wey go allow users earn passive income (money wey dey enter steady) on their crypto holdings directly from the wallet.

content.question: Palma Wallet go support NFTs?
content.answer: Yes, support for viewing and managing NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) dey on the Palma Wallet roadmap. Dis feature go allow users view their NFT collections, receive NFTs, and eventually trade them directly inside the app.

content.question: Menene fasalin musanya na Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Fasalin musanya a Palma Wallet yana baka damar musanya wata cryptocurrency da wata a take a cikin app ɗin. Yana haɗuwa da Changelly, sabis na musanya amintacce, don samar da farashi masu kyau da tallafi ga nau'ikan cryptocurrencies da yawa. Kuna iya musanya tsakanin USDT, USDC, ETH, BTC, da sauran cryptocurrencies da ake tallafawa ba tare da barin app ɗin Palma Wallet ba.

content.question: Yaya zan musanya cryptocurrencies a Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Don musanya cryptocurrencies: 1) Danna maɓallin 'Musanya' a kan allon Farko, 2) Zaɓi cryptocurrency da kake son musanyawa daga (misali, USDT), 3) Zaɓi cryptocurrency da kake son karɓa (misali, ETH), 4) Shigar da adadin da kake son musanyawa, 5) Duba farashin musanya da kuɗin da aka nuna, 6) Tabbatar da bayanan musanya, 7) Za a sarrafa ma'amala ta hanyar ingantaccen tsarin Changelly. Sabon cryptocurrency ɗinka zai bayyana a cikin walat ɗinka da zarar an gama musanya.

content.question: Wadanne cryptocurrencies zan iya musanya a Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Palma Wallet yana tallafawa musanya tsakanin manyan cryptocurrencies ciki har da: 1) USDT (duka ERC20 da TRC20), 2) USDC (ERC20), 3) Ethereum (ETH), 4) Bitcoin (BTC), da sauran shahararrun cryptocurrencies da yawa. Ana ci gaba da sabunta nau'ikan ciniki da ake samu bisa ga kasuwa ta hanyar haɗinmu da Changelly. Kuna iya duba nau'ikan da ake samu a cikin fasalin Musanya.

content.question: Menene kuɗin musanya cryptocurrencies?
content.answer: Kuɗin musanya sun haɗa da: 1) Palma Wallet yana cajin kuɗin ma'amala na 0.5% a kan duk musanya, 2) kuɗin musanya na Changelly (yawanci 0.25-0.5%), 3) kuɗin cibiyar sadarwa don ma'amala na blockchain (yana bambanta da cibiyar sadarwa da cunkoso). An nuna jimlar kuɗin a sarari kafin ku tabbatar da musanya, don haka kuna san ainihin abin da za ku biya. Babu kuɗin ɓoye.

content.question: Yaya tsawon lokacin da musanya ke ɗauka don kammalawa?
content.answer: Lokutan kammalawa na musanya sun dogara da abubuwa da yawa: 1) Musanya na yau da kullun yana ɗaukar minti 5-30, 2) ma'amala na Bitcoin na iya ɗaukar lokaci mai tsawo (har zuwa minti 60) saboda tabbatarwa na cibiyar sadarwa, 3) musanya na Ethereum da ERC20 yawanci yana kammalawa cikin minti 5-15, 4) musanya na TRC20 yawanci ya fi sauri (minti 3-10). Kuna iya bibiyar matsayin musanya a cikin app ɗin a ainihin lokaci.

content.question: Menene mafi ƙaranci da matsakaicin adadin da zan iya musanyawa?
content.answer: Iyakokin musanya suna bambanta da cryptocurrency: 1) Adadin mafi ƙaranci Changelly ne ke saita su kuma yawanci suna tsakanin $10-$50 USD daidai, 2) adadin matsakaici na iya hawa har zuwa $50,000 USD daidai da ma'amala ga masu amfani da aka tabbatar, 3) iyakokin yau da kullun na iya aiki bisa ga matakin tabbatarwa na asusunku. An nuna iyakokin daidai don nau'in da ka zaɓa a cikin fasalin Musanya kafin ka tabbatar da ma'amala.

content.question: Zan iya soke musanya bayan fara shi?
content.answer: Da zarar an tabbatar da musanya kuma an miƙa shi zuwa blockchain, ba za a iya soke shi ba saboda halin da ma'amala na blockchain ke da shi na rashin iya juyawa. Duk da haka: 1) Kuna iya soke shi kafin tabbatarwa ta ƙarshe a cikin app ɗin, 2) Idan musanya ya gaza saboda matsalolin cibiyar sadarwa, za a dawo da kuɗin asalin ku, 3) Koyaushe duba adadin da adiresoshin sau biyu kafin tabbatarwa. Tuntuɓi tallafi idan kun fuskanci kowace matsala da musanya.

content.question: Me ya sa musanya na ke ɗaukar lokaci fiye da yadda ake tsammani?
content.answer: Musanya na iya ɗaukar lokaci mai tsawo saboda: 1) Babban cunkoson cibiyar sadarwa a kan blockchain, 2) ƙarin tabbatarwa da ake buƙata don manyan adadi, 3) jinkiri na ɗan lokaci a ƙarshen sarrafawa na Changelly, 4) kulawa ko sabuntawa na cibiyar sadarwa. Idan musanya ɗinka bai kammala ba a cikin awanni 2, tuntuɓi tallafi tare da ID na musanya ɗinka. Kuna iya ko da yaushe bibiyar matsayin musanya ɗinka a cikin tarihin ma'amala.

content.question: Menene fasalin Fiat On-Ramp a Palma Wallet?
content.answer: Fasalin Fiat On-Ramp yana baka damar siyan cryptocurrency kai tsaye da kuɗin ƙasarku (kamar USD, EUR, NGN, da dai sauransu) ta amfani da hanyoyin biyan kuɗi daban-daban. Palma Wallet yana haɗin gwiwa tare da masu samar da biyan kuɗi da yawa ciki har da MoonPay, Mercuryo, da sauran su ta hanyar tsarin Changelly don samar da farashi masu kyau da babban ɓangaren yankin, musamman mayar da hankali ga kasuwannin Afirka.

content.question: Yaya zan sayi cryptocurrency da kuɗin gida?
content.answer: Don siyan cryptocurrency: 1) Danna maɓallin 'Saye' a kan allon Farko, 2) Zaɓi ƙasarka (ana gano ta ta atomatik a matsayin tsoho), 3) Zaɓi yawan kuɗin da kake son kashewa a cikin kuɗin gida, 4) Zaɓi mai samar da biyan kuɗi da ka fi so daga zaɓuɓɓukan da ake samu, 5) Duba adadin cryptocurrency da za ka karɓa da kuɗin, 6) Danna 'Saye Yanzu' don ci gaba zuwa wurin biyan kuɗi na mai samarwa, 7) Kammala biyan kuɗi a kan gidan yanar gizon mai samarwa, 8) Za a saka cryptocurrency a cikin Palma Wallet ɗinka ta atomatik.

content.question: Wadanne hanyoyin biyan kuɗi ake tallafawa?
content.answer: Hanyoyin biyan kuɗi da ake tallafawa sun bambanta da ƙasa da mai samarwa amma yawanci sun haɗa da: 1) Katunan Bashi/Debit (Visa, Mastercard), 2) Canja wurin banki (ACH, SEPA, Wire), 3) Kudaden wayar hannu (M-PESA, Airtel Money a yankunan da ake tallafawa), 4) Wallets na dijital (Apple Pay, Google Pay), 5) Hanyoyin biyan kuɗi na gida da ke da alaƙa da ƙasarka. An nuna hanyoyin da ake samu lokacin da ka zaɓi mai samarwa.

content.question: Menene kuɗin siyan cryptocurrency?
content.answer: Kuɗin siyan cryptocurrency sun haɗa da: 1) Kuɗin mai samarwa (yawanci 1-4% dangane da hanyar biyan kuɗi), 2) Kuɗin cibiyar sadarwa don saka crypto a cikin walat ɗinka, 3) Kuɗin sarrafa biyan kuɗi (na iya aiki don wasu hanyoyi). Palma Wallet baya cajin ƙarin kuɗi a kan farashin mai samarwa. An nuna duk kuɗin a sarari kafin ku tabbatar da siyan ku.

content.question: Wadanne ƙasashe ake tallafawa don siyan crypto?
content.answer: Fiat on-ramp na Palma Wallet yana tallafawa ƙasashe sama da 150 tare da mai da hankali kan kasuwannin Afirka ciki har da: Najeriya, Kenya, Afirka ta Kudu, Ghana, Uganda, Tanzania, da sauran su da yawa. Masu samar da biyan kuɗi da hanyoyin da ake samu sun dogara da inda kake. Lokacin da ka buɗe fasalin Saye, yana gano ƙasarka ta atomatik kuma yana nuna zaɓuɓɓukan da ake samu. Wasu masu samarwa na iya buƙatar takamaiman takardun da suka danganci dokokin gida.

content.question: Menene iyakokin siye don siyan crypto?
content.answer: Iyakokin siye sun bambanta da mai samarwa da ƙasa: 1) Siyan mafi ƙaranci yawanci yana da $10-$50 USD daidai, 2) iyakar iyaka tana tsakanin $500-$10,000 a kowace ma'amala ga sabbin masu amfani, 3) iyakokin yau da kullun/wata-wata na iya aiki bisa ga matakin tabbatarwa, 4) iyaka mafi girma tana samuwa bayan kammala tabbatarwa na KYC tare da mai samarwa. An nuna iyakokin daidai ga kowane mai samarwa kafin ku ci gaba.

content.question: Yaya tsawon lokaci ake ɗauka don karɓar cryptocurrency da aka saya?
content.answer: Lokutan kammalawa na siye sun bambanta da hanyar biyan kuɗi: 1) Biyan kuɗi da katin: Yawanci minti 10-30, 2) Canja wurin banki: Kwanaki 1-5 na aiki dangane da bankin ku, 3) Kudaden wayar hannu: Yawanci cikin minti 30, 4) Wallets na dijital: Yawanci nan da nan zuwa minti 15. Bayan an tabbatar da biyan kuɗi ta mai samarwa, isar da cryptocurrency zuwa Palma Wallet ɗinka yawanci yana faruwa cikin minti.

content.question: Shin ina buƙatar tabbatar da ainihina don siyan cryptocurrency?
content.answer: Bukatu na tabbatar da ainihi sun dogara da: 1) Mai samar da biyan kuɗi da ka zaɓa, 2) adadin siyan ku, 3) dokokin ƙasarku. Ƙananan sayayya (ƙasa da $150) galibi basa buƙatar tabbatarwa. Manyan adadi yawanci suna buƙatar: 1) Tabbatar da imel, 2) tabbatar da lambar waya, 3) loda ID na gwamnati, 4) tabbatarwa ta hanyar selfie. An nuna buƙatun kowane mai samarwa kafin ka ci gaba.

content.question: Me zan yi idan siyan na ya gaza?
content.answer: Idan siyan ka ya gaza: 1) Duba idan bankin ku/mai ba da katin ku ya ƙi biyan kuɗin, 2) Tabbatar cewa kun shigar da bayanan biyan kuɗi daidai, 3) Tabbatar cewa siyan ku bai wuce iyakoki ba, 4) Gwada wata hanyar biyan kuɗi ko wani mai samarwa, 5) Idan an ɗauki biyan kuɗi amma ba a karɓi crypto ba, ajiye ID na odarka kuma tuntuɓi tallafi na mai samarwa kai tsaye, 6) Tallafi na Palma Wallet na iya taimakawa wajen bibiyar matsayin odarka.

content.question: Zan iya siyar da cryptocurrency don kuɗin gida (Off-Ramp)?
content.answer: A halin yanzu, Palma Wallet yana mai da hankali kan taimaka wa masu amfani su sayi cryptocurrency (on-ramp). An shirya fasalin siyarwa (off-ramp) don fitarwa a nan gaba kuma zai baka damar: 1) Siyar da crypto don kuɗin gida, 2) Cirewa zuwa asusun banki, 3) Amfani da cire kudaden wayar hannu a yankunan da ake tallafawa, 4) Samun damar abokan musayar gida. Duba app ɗin don sabuntawa kan lokacin da wannan fasalin zai kasance a yankinku.

content.question: Me ya sa ake nuna masu samarwa daban-daban ga ƙasashe daban-daban?
content.answer: Masu samar da biyan kuɗi suna da ɓangaren yankin daban-daban dangane da: 1) Bin dokokin gida da lasisi, 2) Haɗin gwiwa da bankuna a kowace ƙasa, 3) Samun tsarin biyan kuɗi, 4) Taimako na kuɗin gida. Palma Wallet yana nuna masu samarwa waɗanda suka fi aiki a yankinku ta atomatik, yana tabbatar da cewa kun sami sabis amintacce da farashi masu kyau don takamaiman ƙasarku.

content.question: Shin siyan cryptocurrency ta hanyar Palma Wallet yana da aminci?
content.answer: I, siyan crypto ta hanyar Palma Wallet yana da aminci saboda: 1) Muna haɗin gwiwa ne kawai tare da masu samar da biyan kuɗi masu lasisi da aka tsara, 2) duk ma'amala suna amfani da ingantaccen rufi, 3) sarrafa biyan kuɗi yana faruwa a kan amintaccen dandamali na mai samarwa, 4) an samar da adireshin Palma Wallet ɗinka ta atomatik don tabbatar da isarwa daidai, 5) muna lura da duk sayayya don nasarar kammalawa. Koyaushe tabbatar da cewa kuna kan gidan yanar gizon mai samarwa daidai lokacin da kuke biyan kuɗi.
